name: Name
invalidName: Your name must be 3 characters or more.
nameDescription: Help people discover your account by using the name you're known by: either your full name, nickname, or business name.
usernameDescription: In most cases, you'll be able to change your username back to {{username}}.
invalidBio: Your bio must be 150 characters or fewer.
infoDescription: Provide your personal information, even if the account is used for a business, a pet or something else. This won't be a part of your public profile.
PHONE_INVALID_COUNTRY: Phone number must have country code.
